description: This file defines a React functional component named MenuItemCard, which renders a menu item with an image, name, optional description, price, and an add button. It uses other components like Card and Button, and utility functions such as formatCurrency to display a menu item in a food delivery application's front-end.

methods.name: MenuItemCard
methods.description: React functional component that displays a menu item with image, description, price, and add-to-cart button.
